title: Google\Cloud\Sql\V1beta4\BackupConfiguration
name: BackupConfiguration
description:
Database instance backup configuration.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.BackupConfiguration

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.start_time
params.description: Start time for the daily backup configuration in UTC timezone in the 24 hour format - HH:MM.

params.name: data.enabled
params.description: Whether this configuration is enabled.

params.name: data.kind
params.description: This is always sql#backupConfiguration.

params.name: data.binary_log_enabled
params.description: (MySQL only) Whether binary log is enabled. If backup configuration is disabled, binarylog must be disabled as well.

params.name: data.replication_log_archiving_enabled
params.description: Reserved for future use.

params.name: data.location
params.description: Location of the backup

params.name: data.point_in_time_recovery_enabled
params.description: (Postgres only) Whether point in time recovery is enabled.

params.name: data.transaction_log_retention_days
params.description: The number of days of transaction logs we retain for point in time restore, from 1-7.

params.name: data.backup_retention_settings
params.description: Backup retention settings.
